ygData.subject: Silvery Legs (spoiler request)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone post some more information on the Silvery legs? I never see any info on these, but see a lot of people wearing them. How do they compare to rubi?
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone post some more information on the Silvery legs?
I never see any info on these, but see a lot of people wearing them.
How do they compare to rubi? Could someone post stats, including weight and
also where to obtain them?


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 40 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Morris [mailto:kronous@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 5:34 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Medium Bronze Armor (Spoiler)


From: "Dan Morris" <kronous@...>

<snip>
On my bard I have the following main pieces:
Mithral Breastplate
Silvery Legs
Skull Shaped Barbute
Black Charred Boots
Azure Sleeves
2 serp bracers
elf hide gloves

<snip>
